source_reference.text: WHAT TO LOOK FOR IN A GUY OR A GIRL || Christian Dating Advice! (Video by Ronnie and Mel)

content_summary:
We’ve all heard it before, if you’re a Christian make sure to be “equally yoked” and only date another Christian. But how many of you know, just because they are a “Christian” does not mean they are right for you to date.

So today, join Ronnie and Mel as they give you their best Christian dating advice on what to look for in a guy or what to look for in a girl. You want to make sure that you make the right choices when choosing the kind of person to date of the opposite gender, because eventually they may become your boyfriend or girlfriend or maybe even your husband or wife. And you want to have wisdom and some non-negotiables going into those relationship situations to avoid any unnecessary heartbreak, or worse, a falling away from your faith. 

So let's jump in and make sure you can spot if someone is truly a man of God or a woman of God and walking with Jesus in their life.
